actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1331(c) of title 10, United States Code, to authorize the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified who were Reserves before August 16, 1954, and who served on active duty during the so-called Berlin crisis, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified who were Reserves before August 16, 1945, and who served on active duty during the so-called Berlin crisis. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1331 (c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1331(c) of title 10, United States Code, to authorize the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified who were Reserves before August 16, 1954, and who served on active duty during the so-called Berlin crisis, and for other purposes.
